title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 6 crypto related magazines up for grabs:LOT 1: WIRED, August 1996 "Nanobucks"LOT 2: yBitcoin, Summer 2014LOT 3: OMNI, June 1991 "The Future Of Money"LOT 4: Fortune, January 2018LOT 5: Very Much Wow, May 2014, Issue #1LOT 6: The Economist, Oct 31, 2015STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 20th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
